mapper.insert: insert into common_dict (dict_type, dict_value, dict_label, value_length, remark) values (#{dictType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dictValue,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{dictLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueLength,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select dict_type, dict_value, dict_label, value_length, remark from common_dict
